line.originaltext: 3/4 cup cake flour
3/4 cup all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon white sugar
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/8 teaspoon baking powder
4 tablespoons unsalted butter
5 tablespoons shortening
1 egg yolk
2 teaspoons distilled white vinegar
3 cubes ice
1/2 cup cold water
Measure butter and shortening onto a plate, put into freezer for about 20 minutes.
Measure butter and shortening onto a plate, put into freezer for about 20 minutes.
Measure butter and shortening onto a plate, put into freezer for about 20 minutes.
Measure butter and shortening onto a plate, put into freezer for about 20 minutes.
Measure cake flour, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt and baking powder into the bowl of a food processor.
Measure cake flour, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt and baking powder into the bowl of a food processor.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4}, ing12, "dry ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: Measure cake flour, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt and baking powder into the bowl of a food processor.
Pulse for a few seconds to mix.
line.annotation: mix(ing12, t1, ing13, "dry ingredients", "pulse for a few seconds")

line.originaltext: Take 1/2 of the cold butter and 1/2 of the cold shortening, put into processor with dry ingredients and pulse off and on for about 1 minute.
line.annotation: separate(ing11, ing14, "half 1 of fats", ing15, "half 2 of fats", "divide")

line.originaltext: Take 1/2 of the cold butter and 1/2 of the cold shortening, put into processor with dry ingredients and pulse off and on for about 1 minute.
Take 1/2 of the cold butter and 1/2 of the cold shortening, put into processor with dry ingredients and pulse off and on for about 1 minute.
line.annotation: mix(ing16, t1, ing17, "dough", "pulse off and on for 1 minute")

line.originaltext: Scrape down twice while doing this.
Take remainder of the cold butter and cold shortening and cut in very briefly with the processor, leaving visible pea-sized chunks.
Take remainder of the cold butter and cold shortening and cut in very briefly with the processor, leaving visible pea-sized chunks.
line.annotation: mix(ing18, t1, ing19, "dough", "cut in very briefly, leaving visible chuncks")

line.originaltext: In a measuring cup, mix egg yolk and vinegar together, add ice cubes and water.
In a measuring cup, mix egg yolk and vinegar together, add ice cubes and water.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing20, "wet ingredients", "")

line.originaltext: In a measuring cup, mix egg yolk and vinegar together, add ice cubes and water.
In a measuring cup, mix egg yolk and vinegar together, add ice cubes and water.
Let this get chilled, about 3 to 4 minutes.
Remove mixed flours and shortening from processor, put into a large mixing bowl.
Remove mixed flours and shortening from processor, put into a large mixing bowl.
Remove mixed flours and shortening from processor, put into a large mixing bowl.
Sprinkle approximately 4 to 5 tablespoons of this egg, water, vinegar mixture, a little at a time, mixing gently with a fork.
line.annotation: separate(ing21, ing22, "4 to 5 tablespoons mixture", ing23, "rest of mixture", "separate")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle approximately 4 to 5 tablespoons of this egg, water, vinegar mixture, a little at a time, mixing gently with a fork.
Sprinkle approximately 4 to 5 tablespoons of this egg, water, vinegar mixture, a little at a time, mixing gently with a fork.
line.annotation: mix(ing24, t3, ing25, "dough", "mix gently with a fork")

line.originaltext: The key to this is, you do not want a wet dough, and you do not want to overmix.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing25,"make sure it's not a wet dough and don't overmix")

line.originaltext: Place this dough into plastic wrap or plastic bag, chill in refrigerator for a few minutes.
Place this dough into plastic wrap or plastic bag, chill in refrigerator for a few minutes.
Place this dough into plastic wrap or plastic bag, chill in refrigerator for a few minutes.
Place this dough into plastic wrap or plastic bag, chill in refrigerator for a few minutes.
line.annotation: leave(ing25,"chill for a few minutes in the refrigerator")

line.originaltext: Remove from refrigerator and roll out.
Remove from refrigerator and roll out.
